feed.title: AutoKitteh Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add linear connTest function by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1193
  • fix(salesforce): reinitialize grpc client after errors by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1199

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.5...v0.15.6

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(pythonrt): properly return subscribe error by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1198
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v5 from 5.2.1 to 5.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1200
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v4 from 4.5.1 to 4.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1201
  • feat: switch to store jwt in cookie by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1189
  • fix(python): Ignore files/directories starting with . by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1202
  • fix user cookie has nil user on first signup login by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1203
  • fix first login not working by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1204
  • chore: improve Jira event logs for parsing errors by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1206
  • fix: add thread_ts from app_mention event in slack by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1205

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.6...v0.15.7

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: make session cookie http only by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1207
  • fix(jira): remove support for issue_property_set and issue_property_deleted by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1208
  • fix(jira): ignore irrelevant events + cosmetic tweaks by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1209

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.7...v0.15.8

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: call cleanup once pythonrt is done by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1211

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.8...v0.15.9

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: allow redispatch in authz by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1210
  • fix(python): deal with unpicklable exceptions correctly when not caught by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1212

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.9...v0.15.10
